name: GAMESBUYSELL
description: GamesBuySell (GBS) is a deflationary BEP-20 token built on BNB Smart Chain that integrates gaming, NFTs, e-sports, and DeFi into one ecosystem. The project provides a marketplace where users can buy and sell game keys, gift cards, and digital assets using cryptocurrencies. Its ecosystem includes an NFT marketplace, staking opportunities, and community-driven e-sports activities. The tokenomics feature locked liquidity, burn mechanisms, and vesting contracts to enhance transparency and long-term sustainability.
